modulesettings.BlackListItemText: Site Administrator: Set this message up under Layout Settings.

dynamicquestion.question: This section demonstrates a calculation performed with the use of radio buttons.  Radio buttons are best used for single selections like membership types.  In this scenario, we're offering 3 different service plans.  Notice that the Bronze plan is the default selection.  You can alter this setting under Advanced Field Options.  The price of the service will be automatically displayed beneath the radio buttons based on your choice.
What plan do you want to purchase?
Total
dynamicquestion.helptext: Please enter a value for the field TotalHidden.

dynamicquestion.question: <h2 id="Total">Your total comes to: $0.00</h2>
dynamicquestion.helptext: Please enter a value for New Field
dynamicquestion.requiredfieldtext: Please enter a value for New Field
Please enter a value for New Field
dynamicquestion.requiredfielderror: Please enter a value for New Field

dynamicquestion.question: This section demonstrates a calculation performed by choosing values from 2 drop-down menus. This is a great solution if you want to offer combinations of products in different categories.  The total value for the fees ("Product One" and "Product Two") will be calculated based on the values chosen from the pull down menu.
Select your apples
Select your basket
dynamicquestion.helptext: Please enter a value for the field Select your basket.

dynamicquestion.question: <h2 id="TotalCombo">Your total comes to: $0.00</h2>
dynamicquestion.helptext: Please enter a value for New Field
dynamicquestion.requiredfieldtext: Please enter a value for New Field
Please enter a value for New Field
dynamicquestion.requiredfielderror: Please enter a value for New Field

dynamicquestion.question: Section 3:  Check Box List

This section demonstrates a calculation performed by selecting check boxes, i.e. the products.  Note that unlike a radio button, a check box list will allow for multiple selections.  The total value for all selected products will be displayed in the Text/HTML field.
Products
dynamicquestion.helptext: Please enter a value for the field Products.
Please enter a value for Text

Please enter a value for Text
